availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: David W. Roberts (Morgan County, Kentucky, laborer)

body.p: Morgan County, Kentucky, laborer. Kentucky native. Married to Nancy Walsh Roberts on March 4, 1847. Father of Mary J. Roberts, Elizabeth A. Roberts, and William F. Roberts. Laborer in Morgan County in 1850. Resident of Morgan County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States_ (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Morgan, p. 156A. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Morgan, District No. 1, p. 15-16. Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records - Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #000839918, Morgan County Marriages, p. 83.
